original_title: SLIC expands its presence in the North Region
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka Insurance – instated two Agency Business Development Centers (ABDC) in the North Region on the 28th of April 2023. The Puthukkudiyiruppu ABDC is located opposite Puthukkudiyiruppu Post Office, Paranthan Mullai Road, Puthukkudiyiruppu East, Mullaitiuv while the Kodikamam ABDC is located opposite the Railway Station, 1st floor, A9 Road, Kodikamam.

The occasion was graced by Ms. Namalee A. Silva Deputy General Manager/Head of Marketing and Life Distribution, Mr. Jagath Welgama Assistant General Manager/Head of National Sales (Life), the management teams of the Mullaitiuv and Chavakachcheri Branches, distinguished invitees and customers of the area.
Agency Business Development Centers allows SLIC to further enhance its reach, which provides convenience and speed of service delivery to its loyal customers in relation with their protection needs.
